name: Kecleon
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

poke_body.name: Camouflage
poke_body.effect: If any basic Energy card attached to Kecleon is the same as the Attacking Pokémon’s type, any damage done by attacks from the Pokémon to Kecleon is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Blind Scratch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does no damage to the Defending Pokémon. Instead, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
